tool.name: Pathway Visualiser
tool.help:
Pathway Visualiser ==========================
This tool provides a graphical output of the heterologous pathway and the calculated pathway characteristics.
Input ------
Required:
* **-input_format**\ : (string) Format of the input (tar or sbml) * **-input**\ : (string) Path to the input file
Output ------
* **output**\ : (string) Path to the HTML file
